name: Fire & Ice: the Daring Adventures of Cool Coyote
description:
It's not just cute, I'ts not simply classic, It's the finest platform game ever!

THE ONE 92%

With all the levels, power-ups, bonuses, features, hidden secrets and multiples that you'd expect from award winning Graftgold.
